category_descriptions.Dehydrated Onion Powder: Includes ground, milled, and pulverized dehydrated onions for use as a seasoning or ingredient.
category_descriptions.Dehydrated Onion Granules: Includes dehydrated onion in granular form, typically sized between powder and minced.
category_descriptions.Dehydrated Minced Onion: Includes dehydrated onion that has been chopped or diced into small pieces.
category_descriptions.Toasted Dehydrated Onion Products: Includes dehydrated onion products that have undergone a toasting or roasting process.
category_descriptions.Dehydrated Onion Flakes and Slices: Includes dehydrated onion that has been sliced or made into flakes.
category_descriptions.Organic Dehydrated Onion: Includes dehydrated onion products that are certified organic.
